tables.description: Contains records of patient disease cohorts, linking individuals with disease groups and diagnosis metadata.

columns.name: personal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

columns.name: major_group_id
columns.description: Identifier for the major disease group the pathology belongs to.

columns.name: pathology_id
columns.description: Identifier of the specific pathology assigned to the patient.

columns.name: diagnosis_code
columns.description: Identifier of the specific icd10 code assigned to the patient. (e.g., I10, M47)

columns.name: admission_date
columns.description: Exact date of patient admission or diagnosis registration. (e.g., 2023-03-21 10:02:00, 2021-10-31 00:00:00)

columns.name: admission_week
columns.description: Week number of the admission date. (e.g., 3, 5)

columns.name: admission_month
columns.description: Month number of the admission date. (e.g., 3, 10)

columns.name: admission_year
columns.description: Year of the admission date. (e.g., 2023, 2021)

tables.description: Contains aggregated patient visit information, linking individuals with visit types and temporal metadata.

columns.name: personal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

columns.name: visit_type_id
columns.description: Identifier for the type of visit. (e.g., inpatient, outpatient, emergency).

columns.name: visit_week
columns.description: Week number in which the visit occurred. (e.g., 3, 2)

columns.name: visit_month
columns.description: Month number in which the visit occurred. (e.g., 11, 4)

columns.name: visit_year
columns.description: Year in which the visit occurred. (e.g., 2021, 2025)

columns.name: total_visits
columns.description: Total number of visits for the patient in the given period. (e.g., 1, 1)

tables.description: Contains records of medical procedures for patients, with limited major group identifiers and linked with admission date metadata.

columns.name: personal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

columns.name: major_group_id
columns.description: Identifier for the major procedure group assigned to the patient.

columns.name: admission_date
columns.description: Exact date of procedure admission or registration. (e.g., 2021-12-26 00:00:00, 2025-08-02 19:34:54.609091000)

columns.name: admission_week
columns.description: Week number of the admission date. (e.g., 4, 1)

columns.name: admission_month
columns.description: Month number of the admission date. (e.g., 12, 11)

columns.name: admission_year
columns.description: Year of the admission date. (e.g., 2021, 2017)

tables.description: Contains patient obesity-related data, including BMI measurements, weight status categories, and time intervals of recorded scans.

columns.name: personal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

columns.name: BMI
columns.description: Body Mass Index value calculated for the patient. (e.g., 27.0842 , 27.3438)

columns.name: weight_status_category_id
columns.description: Identifier for the weight status category (e.g., underweight, normal, overweight, obese).

columns.name: scan_start_date
columns.description: Date when the BMI scan or measurement started. (e.g., 2022-05-24 17:36:02, 2022-11-09 08:22:39)

columns.name: scan_start_week
columns.description: Week number of the scan start date. (e.g., 2, 4)

columns.name: scan_start_month
columns.description: Month number of the scan start date. (e.g., 5, 11)

columns.name: scan_start_year
columns.description: Year of the scan start date. (e.g., 2022, 2024)

columns.name: scan_end_date
columns.description: Date when the BMI scan or measurement ended. (e.g., 2022-11-08 08:22:39, 2024-05-02 16:10:00)

columns.name: scan_end_week
columns.description: Week number of the scan end date. (e.g., 2, 1)

columns.name: scan_end_month
columns.description: Month number of the scan end date. (e.g., 11, 5)

columns.name: scan_end_year
columns.description: Year of the scan end date. (e.g., 2022, 2024)

tables.description: Contains patient-level information related to high-risk conditions, including disease type, risk score, and timestamps.

columns.name: personal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

columns.name: disease
columns.description: Name of the disease or condition related to the high-risk category. (e.g., Diabetes, Stroke)

columns.name: high_risk_id
columns.description: Identifier for the high-risk condition category.

columns.name: high_risk_Timestamp_date
columns.description: Original timestamp when the high-risk condition was detected or flagged. (e.g., 2024-03-28 13:39:00, 2024-03-05 10:23:00)

columns.name: high_risk_Timestamp_week
columns.description: Week number derived from the high-risk timestamp. (e.g., 4, 1)

columns.name: high_risk_Timestamp_month
columns.description: Month number derived from the high-risk timestamp. (e.g., 3, 7)

columns.name: high_risk_Timestamp_year
columns.description: Year derived from the high-risk timestamp. (e.g., 2024, 2025)

columns.name: score
columns.description: Numerical score indicating the severity or probability of the high-risk condition. (e.g., 0.0677033658213765, 0.057633035728280865)

tables.description: Stores core demographic attributes for each patient and links to geographic, and age group lookup tables.

columns.name: personal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: Identifier for the healthcare cluster/service catchment to which the patient is assigned.

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Identifier for the region catchment to where the patient live.

columns.name: governorate_id
columns.description: Governorate identifier.

columns.name: moh_branch_id
columns.description: MOH branch identifier.

columns.name: city_id
columns.description: Identifier for the city catchment to where the patient live.

columns.name: district_id
columns.description: District identifier within the city where the patient live.

columns.name: gender_id
columns.description: Gender identifier.

columns.name: age
columns.description: Patient age (in years) at the reference time for the cohort snapshot. (e.g., 34, 42)

columns.name: age_range
columns.description: Patient's age group (e.g., '0-4', '5-9', '65+').

columns.name: min_age
columns.description: Lower bound of the age group.

columns.name: max_age
columns.description: Upper bound of the age group.

columns.name: is_saudi
columns.description: Nationality flag; 1 if Saudi national, 0 otherwise.

columns.name: is_assigned
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the patient is assigned to a facility/PHC within the cluster. 1 means assigned, 0 otherwise.

columns.name: has_insurance
columns.description: Insurance coverage flag. 1 if has insurance, 0 otherwise.

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Active status flag for the cohort period. 1 means active, 0 otherwise.

columns.name: is_dead
columns.description: Mortality flag; 1 if the patient is deceased, 0 otherwise.

columns.name: death_date
columns.description: Date of death (if applicable). (e.g., 2024-10-17 10:00:00, 2014-01-14 00:00:00). NULL if not dead.

columns.name: segment_id
columns.description: Identifier for the segment for the patient.

columns.name: comorbidity_index
columns.description: Represents the classification of the number of comorbid conditions associated with a patient. Values might be: 0 means no comorbidities, >=5 means five or more comorbidities, or the value might be a range which indicate set of comorbidities.

columns.name: row_created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the row was first created.

columns.name: row_updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the row.

tables.description: Reference table for ICD-10 segmentation, providing hierarchical grouping of diseases and pathologies along with coding details and metadata.

columns.name: segment_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the top-level ICD-10 segment.

columns.name: segment
columns.description: Name of the ICD-10 segment. (e.g., Chronic Conditions, Healthy)

columns.name: sub_segment_id
columns.description: Identifier for the ICD-10 sub-segment under the segment.

columns.name: sub_segment
columns.description: Name of the ICD-10 sub-segment. (e.g., Neurologic Conditions, Maternity and Infant)

columns.name: major_group_id
columns.description: Identifier for the major disease group within the ICD-10 hierarchy.

columns.name: major_group
columns.description: Name of the major disease group. (e.g., Neuropathies, Acutely Ill)

columns.name: pathology_id
columns.description: Identifier for the specific pathology in the ICD-10 structure.

columns.name: pathology
columns.description: Name of the pathology linked to the ICD-10 code. (e.g., ARTERIAL and VENOUS VASCULOPATHY, CELIAC DISEASE)

columns.name: rank
columns.description: Rank or ordering of the pathology within the group.

columns.name: saudi_segment
columns.description: Saudi-specific mapping or segment classification if applicable. (e.g., 1.a, 3.f)

columns.name: icd10_general_codes
columns.description: General ICD-10 code(s) representing the disease group. (e.g., G11, A09)

columns.name: icd10_specific_codes
columns.description: Specific ICD-10 codes for detailed diagnosis. (e.g., G11.2, O99.5)

columns.name: is_chronic_disease
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the condition is chronic (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

columns.name: cost
columns.description: Average or reference cost associated with the pathology. (e.g., 2886, 35438)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the row was first created. (e.g., 2024-10-17 10:00:00, 2014-01-14 00:00:00)

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the row. (e.g., 2024-10-17 10:00:00, 2014-01-14 00:00:00)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines the different types of patient encounters (e.g., inpatient, outpatient, emergency), with multilingual labels.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the encounter type.

columns.name: code
columns.description: System code representing the encounter type. (e.g., O, ER, Short-Stay)

columns.name: label_en
columns.description: Encounter type label in English. (e.g., outpatient, Inpatient, Emergency)

columns.name: label_ar
columns.description: Encounter type label in Arabic. (e.g., عيادات خارجية, عيادات داخلية, زيارة منزلية)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines weight status categories for obesity classification, with English labels and timestamps.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the weight status category.

columns.name: name_en
columns.description: Weight status category name in English (e.g., Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese).

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the category record. (e.g., 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543, 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the category record was first created. (e.g., 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543, 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543)

tables.description: Master data table that defines healthcare clusters and their associated regions, with multilingual labels and codes.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the healthcare cluster.

columns.name: cluster_short_code
columns.description: Short code representing the healthcare cluster. (e.g., R1, E3)

columns.name: cluster_long_code
columns.description: Long code or full reference code for the healthcare cluster. (e.g., Riyadh1, East3)

columns.name: cluster_en
columns.description: Cluster name in English. (e.g., Riyadh First Health Cluster, Eastern Health Cluster)

columns.name: cluster_ar
columns.description: Cluster name in Arabic. (e.g., تجمع الرياض الصحي الأول, تجمع الشرقية الصحي الثالث)

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Identifier of the region associated with the cluster.

columns.name: region_ar
columns.description: Region name in Arabic. (e.g., منطقة الرياض, المنطقة الشرقية)

columns.name: region_en
columns.description: Region name in English. (e.g., Riyadh, Eastern Region)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the cluster record was first created. (e.g., 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543, 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543)

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the cluster record. (e.g., 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543, 2023-08-30 22:37:47.543)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines administrative healthcare regions with English labels.

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the healthcare region.

columns.name: region_en
columns.description: Region name in English. (e.g., Riyadh, Makkah)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines MOH governorates and their associated MOH branches with multilingual labels.

columns.name: governorate_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the governorate.

columns.name: governorate_en
columns.description: Governorate name in English. (e.g., Al Bahah, Al Hajrah)

columns.name: governorate_ar
columns.description: Governorate name in Arabic. (e.g., الباحة , الحجرة)

columns.name: moh_branch_id
columns.description: Identifier for the MOH branch associated with the governorate.

columns.name: moh_branch_ar
columns.description: MOH branch name in Arabic. (e.g., الباحة , عسير)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines cities within healthcare catchment areas, including multilingual names and their association with regions and governorates.

columns.name: city_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the city.

columns.name: city_en
columns.description: City name in English. (e.g., AL AWADHAH, AD DISAH)

columns.name: city_ar
columns.description: City name in Arabic. (e.g., وادي تربه الخيالة, الثعبان والظهيره)

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Identifier for the region to which the city belongs.

columns.name: governorate_id
columns.description: Identifier for the governorate to which the city belongs.

columns.name: governorate_en
columns.description: Governorate name in English. (e.g., Al Qara, Qilwah)

columns.name: governorate_ar
columns.description: Governorate name in Arabic. (e.g., القرى, قلوه)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the city record was first created. (e.g., 2022-10-05 12:21:41.653810000, 2022-10-05 12:21:41.653810000)

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the city record. (e.g., 2022-10-05 12:21:41.653810000, 2022-10-05 12:21:41.653810000)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines districts within healthcare catchment areas, including multilingual names, geographic coordinates, and associations with clusters, cities, governorates, and regions.

columns.name: district_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the district.

columns.name: district_en
columns.description: District name in English. (e.g., 'UNAYKIR, UTHAL)

columns.name: district_ar
columns.description: District name in Arabic. (e.g., عنيكر, أوثال)

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: Identifier of the healthcare cluster associated with the district.

columns.name: latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the district’s geographic center.

columns.name: longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the district’s geographic center.

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Identifier for the region the district belongs to.

columns.name: region_en
columns.description: Region name in English. (e.g., Makkah, Qassim)

columns.name: city_id
columns.description: Identifier of the city the district belongs to.

columns.name: city_en
columns.description: City name in English. (e.g., 'UNAYKIR, UTHAL)

columns.name: governorate_id
columns.description: Identifier for the governorate the district belongs to.

columns.name: governorate_en
columns.description: Governorate name in English. (e.g., Al Qunfudhah, Uyun Al Jiwa)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the district record was first created. (e.g., 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000, 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000)

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the district record. (e.g., 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000, 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000)

tables.description: Lookup table that defines gender categories with multilingual labels.

columns.name: gender_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the gender category.

columns.name: gender
columns.description: General gender code or label. (e.g., M, F)

columns.name: gender_en
columns.description: Gender name in English. (e.g., Male, Female)

columns.name: gender_ar
columns.description: Gender name in Arabic. (e.g., ذكر, أنثى)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the gender record was first created. (e.g., 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000, 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000)

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the gender record. (e.g., 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000, 2022-09-24 20:28:19.101710000)
